author: benh
msg: Updates to the torque setup script and framework.

author: benh
msg: Moved definitions to cpp file and added doxygen comments to the hpp file

author: benh
msg: FTMessaging class added. STATUS messages from slaves are reliable, they're acked, and resent if no ack is received, redundant messages are dropped. A libprocess abstraction is added that converts a Tuple to a string, such that pending messages are stored in a container by FTMessaging.
